response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $10,500. This is a significant discount compared to the market value of $12,000, aiming to make it more accessible while still ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10500}
